title: Messages >~ 5000 chars break layout in chat  on Android
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem
Messages from others are not bubbled (reported in https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/3097)  and if you are a sender of message, content is not shown (white screen instead)
5000 is approximate number, the message with 4661 is rendered fine, 5000 contains an issue.

#### Expected behavior
All messages are shown, markdown is preserved (as on IOS)

#### Actual behavior
When Android is recipient:
![photo_2019-11-19 12 54 02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/69144487-b1738c00-0acb-11ea-92b3-8d7e2e78e481.jpeg)

When Android is sender:
![photo_2019-11-19 12 53 59](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/69144472-ad476e80-0acb-11ea-9e35-9c4f490a4675.jpeg)


Content of the message is not shown, however it can be copied.

### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Join any public chat 
- Send message with 5000 chars (exmple is [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XueoOwwBN9cgbahpFJmgtetTKAN7gMkmQW828-qX7GI/edit?usp=sharing)
- send message from another device.

### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 18/11/2019
- Operating System: Android

Hmmm, I can't reproduce this on Samsung Galaxy S8. I've sent a message with 5k - 10k characters, incl. with special characters, and see my content in message bubbles on both sides. 

This is on RC2. 

Is there an existing character length for messages @yenda?
I think it may have been fixed by now truncating long messages? Though now we don't have "show more" button so some messages are pretty long

I don't have any problem with sending/receiving long messages, but there is a problem with colours when you are a receiver (android emulator). Links are clickable with any color.
5k chars:

![Screenshot 2020-02-05 at 14 41 26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5786310/73842793-f20ab800-4825-11ea-9561-d373b96e7d53.png)

On 10k chars I can see a layout break:
![Screenshot 2020-02-05 at 14 49 10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5786310/73843207-db189580-4826-11ea-8fa2-a580e0d1bcf5.png)
